sourcesContent: import{styled as t}from"../theme/stitches.config";export const StyledContainer=t("div",{w:"100%",mr:"auto",ml:"auto",variants:{fluid:{true:{maxWidth:"100%"}},responsive:{true:{"@xs":{maxWidth:"$breakpoints$xs"},"@sm":{maxWidth:"$breakpoints$sm"},"@md":{maxWidth:"$breakpoints$md"},"@lg":{maxWidth:"$breakpoints$lg"},"@xl":{maxWidth:"$breakpoints$xl"}}}},defaultVariants:{fluid:!1,responsive:!0}});export default StyledContainer;
